name: Filigree
overview: The Filigree Post, TFP is a business and technology editorial that seeks to inform enterprise stakeholders about market trends in economic value creation and growth. It’s mission is to provide world-class training and lean advisory services through market insights, strategy and corporate education. TFP is led by Samuel K.B Dzidzornu and supported by a strong research team with graduate and professional qualifications in: Economics,Marketing,Statistics & Mathematics,IT,Human resource management,Law. Through TFP’s seminars and publications, the team demonstrates in-depth perspectives on current trends in IT and global business. Inspired by this vision, Filigree is founded on a belief that corporate cultural change through learning is key to enterprise transformation.
